p: One of the key advantages of NTAP in comparison to other non-thermal food preservation technologies is its ability to inactivate not only bacteria, molds and yeasts, but also mold ascospores and bacterial spores (Muranyi et al., 2007; Rowan et al., 2007; Shi et al., 2011; Kl√§mpfl et al., 2012; Dasan et al., 2016).
